pages.text: Kitchen facilities includes counters, stoves, chimneys to fit for different designs.
Mud and stone ones are the cheapest. Only require dirt and cobblestone. They are no different from others, except mud stove is slower.
Stone ones are made of stone bricks and stone slabs, but not stone brick slabs.
Brick ones are made of bricks and bricks slabs.
Opus Latericium ones are made of Opus Latericium and its slabs. It just like brick ones but with exposed concrete.
Opus Incertum ones are made of Opus Incertum and its slabs
